name: The Seventh Throne
description:
The product of a ten week basic Game-Studio course. Ambition and excitement when tampered with workflow issues lead to a product that fell far short of it's scope. However, the competitive minigame concept was enjoyable, and could have legs with a different angle. 

The intent was to model debate in a rock-paper-scissors style utilizing minigames, then build on that core into  a small campaign-game.

 Drew Bronson and Sam Doty provided additional programming. Art by Kimani Emmanuel, (keeks.portfoliobox.net) Music by Hunter Hanson and Tristan Arostegui.
